extension.description:
List roms and runs them with an emulator.
Features: -Executes emulators with roms and also normal applications -Simple search function to search your rom collections -Grabs thumbs from the rom folder if possible SomeRom.dmp = SomeRom.png / jpg / gif / bmp
Limitations: -Filenames may not contain any comma "," -Search engine no longer working as it seems -> disabled
